rule.description: Ungafaka lesi silungiselelo ngokuchofoza kwesokudla imenyu kunoma yiliphi ikhasi lewebhu, i-URL yekhasi lewebhu izokwengezwa njengomthetho ngokuzenzakalelayo .

glob.title: Indlela yeglobhu isebenzisa ilabhulali ye-{{1}} Sicela ubone ukuze uyisebenzise, ​​noma ungasesha ukusetshenziswa kwe-{{2}}.

example.a: {{1}}, elifana nekhasi eliyisiqalo le-YouTube nawo wonke amakhasi amancane.

regexp.title: Isisho esivamile, sicela ubone Bona ukuze uyisebenzise.
